thread.title: DOOM: The Dark Ages will be released on May 15 and immediately on Game Pass, gameplay was shown and details were told
thread.title_full: DOOM: The Dark Ages will be released on May 15 and immediately on Game Pass, gameplay was shown and details were told

author: Aroged
title: DOOM: The Dark Ages will be released on May 15 and immediately on Game Pass, gameplay was shown and details were told
text:
Developers from id Software studio announced the release date of DOOM: The Dark Ages on Xbox Developer_Direct. As previously indicated in leaks, the project will be released on May 15, 2025 â€“ directly on Xbox Series X | S, Playstation 5 and PC, plus Game Pass.
DOOM: The Dark Ages is a prequel to DOOM and DOOM Eternal. The events of the game will unfold in a gloomy setting that combines elements of fantasy and science fiction.
In the video below, the developers talked about the 3 main pillars of the game:
- Fight. The authors gave the first details about the new weapon, including one of mass destruction, that the Executioner will be able to wield.
- Study. Players are given a glimpse into an incredible new medieval setting that will take them into dark and sinister worlds like never before.
- Plot. They showed some of the characters and also talked about the events that the Executioner will face on his journey.
The developers also said that DOOM: The Dark Ages is the most ambitious game in the series to date. They are confident that it will appeal to both fans of the franchise and newcomers.
Screenshots of DOOM: The Dark Ages
